name: Staci C. Barkouskie
text: Pizza crust was buttery and flakey! So good. I get the thin crust, light sauce, veggie lovers minus the tomato!üçÑüçï

name: Aubie Nash
text: Pizza Hut is an old time favorite for me and my family. The food is always good. Price may be a bit higher than the other pizza places, but, I believe you get what you pay for and it should always be your money worth.

name: Glenn Solomon
text: Very fine hb wings!

name: Floyd Thomas
text: Good buffet at lunch. Nice clean establishment.

name: baker H
text: Nicely redecorated, and great updated menu. I'm only giving a 3 star because there were no GF options. The wings I had were freshly prepared and delicious. Fries savory. Glad to see this chain doing well. You won't be disappointed.

name: Joseph Owens
text: Very good

name: nunya bidness08
text: Wings were not cooked all the way. Pizza was supposed to have 2 toppings,  got 1 topping and 2 pieces of another topping..  Older white lady was SUPER RUDE. Very disappointed, have never had any issues with this store.. It's true what they say, I bad employee can ruin it for everyone!

name: Beatriz Monterroza
text: Good. Add the non-bread pizza plis.

text: The pizza was very good but they close it at 1:30 most pizza huts go until 2:00 pm.

name: Wesley Gunn
text: The pizza was soaked in grease with very little sauce. Prices were higher than displayed on the menu. Sodas were off. The only decent thing was the wings.

text: Kala was very nice & helpful when I asked a question. On the other hand the night manager Tina was very rude & almost made me step out of character. Kala has what it takes to do tina job.

name: John G
text: Staff is very nice and welcoming, but pizza is a whole other story.... Cheese on stuffed crust is NOT mozzarella, (at least not of any moderate quality) . Ordered a replacement meat lovers thin crust but ended up having to oull the sausage and beef off just to tolerate it due to the foul smell.  Again staff is very nice.

text: Cleanest Hut I've ever been to. Great service every time. Complimentary discounts if they mis quote a time. I cannot believe for a moment the other reviews about smoking and rude service. Maybe they are  extra nice to me because I'm pleasantly fat and eat more pizza than skinny folk.
